Purpose: To quantitatively detect Gliadin (Deamidated) IgA antibodies in serum for accurate and reliable clinical diagnosis.
Container: Plain red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA reader (spectrophotometer), ELISA microplate incubator/shaker, micropipettes, Gliadin (Deamidated) Antibody IgA ELISA kit
